brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts the use of a subinterface to establish communication between multiple V LANs. There are three V LAN's, V LAN 1, V LAN 15, and V LAN 35, each represented by a different colored circle. All three V LAN's connect to the router via a single link (subinterface).

Network
One Router (R1).
One Switch (S1).
R1 is connected to S1 via single link.
S1 has three V LAN's (V LAN 1, V LAN 15, V LAN 35).
V LAN 1 has one Host.
V LAN 15 has two Hosts
V LAN 35 has one Host
